controller

Class SimulationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SimulationController

  • public class SimulationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that coordinates the various part of the simulation engine to realize a command line simulator
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulationController

        public SimulationController(java.lang.String mapFileName,
                    int defaultSpeed)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        default constructor
        Parameters:
        mapFileName - name of the .jpg file containing the map in which the robot will move
        defaultSpeed - default speed that the controller will use to move the robot
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thown if the file it's not founded or isn't well formatted

    • Method Detail

      • setScoreCalculator

        public void setScoreCalculator(IRobotPositionToScore calculator)
        sets the IRobotPositionToScore that associate an integer score to the robot position
        Parameters:
        calculator - transform the robot position in the map in an integer score

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Restore the initial position of the simulated robot and put the simulated time to 0

      • startSimulation

        public int startSimulation(int numberOfSteps,
                  boolean verbose,
                  int millisForTick)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        perform a full simulation of the behave of teh simulated robot
        Parameters:
        numberOfSteps - number of elementary steps that will be simulated
        verbose - true for printing robot position at each step
        millisForTick - millisecond foreach elementary step simulated
        Returns:
        the score associated with the simulation, 0 if the robot exited the map.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
